entries.title: Cine2Nerdle is a remarkably fun Wordle-like for movie obsessives
entries.description: I’d understand if you entered 2023 feeling a bit Wordle’d out. But if you love the movies, Cine2Nerdle may feel like a breath of fresh air.

entries.title: Can a severed finger unlock a phone? Answers to your security questions.
entries.description: Don't freak out about fingerprint and face scans on your phones -- or the risk of a crook using your severed finger to unlock your iPhone.

entries.title: Musk’s securities fraud trial begins over Tesla ‘Funding secured’ tweet
entries.description: Musk is being sued by shareholders over a 2018 tweet in which he declared he had financing to take Tesla private, a statement the court has deemed "untrue."

entries.title: What the Jan. 6 probe found out about social media, but didn’t report
entries.description: The Jan. 6 committee's 845-page report offered few details of social media's role in the Capitol riot. Transcripts and an unreleased memo shows the committee knew more.

entries.title: 10 years later, ‘This is fine’ meme creator wants to put out the fire
entries.description: The dog in a burning house has become internet shorthand for resignation. After covid, insurrection and other strife, K.C. Green wants the dog — and us — to be free.
